title: Configure real outbound subscription checkout links for Monthly and Annual CTAs

requirements.summary: Replace placeholder subscription link config with real https checkout URLs and ensure the Subscribe CTA opens the correct outbound link in a new tab while preserving click tracking.
acceptanceCriteria: In frontend/src/config/subscriptionLinks.ts, subscriptionLinks.monthly is set to a non-empty, valid https URL for the Monthly ($6.00) checkout page.
In frontend/src/config/subscriptionLinks.ts, subscriptionLinks.annual is set to a non-empty, valid https URL for the Annual ($15.99) checkout page.
When a visitor selects Monthly and clicks the Subscribe button, the site opens the configured Monthly checkout URL in a new tab.
When a visitor selects Annual and clicks the Subscribe button, the site opens the configured Annual checkout URL in a new tab.
Click tracking continues to record clicks for 'subscription-monthly' and 'subscription-annual' before opening the outbound link.
No user-facing text is changed away from English.

file_operations.description: Set subscriptionLinks.monthly and subscriptionLinks.annual to the provided real, non-empty https checkout URLs for the Monthly ($6.00) and Annual ($15.99) plans (replace the current empty-string placeholders).

Harden the subscribe click handler to only open configured valid https URLs in a new tab (noopener/noreferrer) and to preserve the existing click-tracking call order (record 'subscription-monthly' / 'subscription-annual' then open the outbound link), without changing any user-facing English text and without modifying any files under frontend/src/components/ui.
